com.stripe.android.view

Class CardMultilineWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.stripe.android.view.CardMultilineWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class CardMultilineWidget
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
    A multiline card input widget using the support design library's TextInputLayout to match Material Design.
